      • wrapInBackgroundImage

        public static javax.swing.JPanel wrapInBackgroundImage(javax.swing.JComponent component,
                                       javax.swing.Icon backgroundIcon)
        Wraps a Swing JComponent in a background image. Simply invokes the overloded variant with Top/Leading alignment for background image.
        Parameters:
        component - - to wrap in the a background image
        backgroundIcon - - the background image (Icon)
        Returns:
        the wrapping JPanel

      • wrapInBackgroundImage

        public static javax.swing.JPanel wrapInBackgroundImage(javax.swing.JComponent component,
                                       javax.swing.Icon backgroundIcon,
                                       int verticalAlignment,
                                       int horizontalAlignment)
        Wraps a Swing JComponent in a background image. The vertical and horizontal alignment of background image can be specified using the alignment contants from JLabel.
        Parameters:
        component - - to wrap in the a background image
        backgroundIcon - - the background image (Icon)
        verticalAlignment - - vertical alignment. See contants in JLabel.
        horizontalAlignment - - horizontal alignment. See contants in JLabel.
        Returns:
        the wrapping JPanel

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
